references.title: Rab7 reduces α-synuclein toxicity in rats and primary neurons.
references.authors: Szegö EM, Van den Haute C, Höfs L, Baekelandt V, Van der Perren A, Falkenburger BH

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2f8kq","text":"Homogenise samples in 150 µL ice-cold lysis buffer  (1% Triton X-100 in 0.1 M phosphate buffered saline solution,   , supplemented with protease and phosphatase inhibitors. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":114,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6tu6q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"ph","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"","id":0,"number":"7.6"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"44rkt","text":"Mix 4 µg samples in Laemmli sample buffer supplemented with 5 % beta-mercaptoethanol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4lkup","text":"Separate samples (4 µg total protein) by polyacrylamide gel electrophoresis using precast Bolt™ 4-20% Bis-Tris, 1.0 mm, Mini Protein Gels at 120 V   or until dye front reaches the bottom of the gel. Run with pre-stained size markers","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":147,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":4800,"guid":"426713C0BCFE11ED8C5B43B5A8FDC981","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"afp2","text":"Soak nitrocellulose membrane (pore size: 0.2 µm) with Towbin buffer (see materials)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"72p31","text":"Soak transfer sandwich components (2 sheets of filter paper and 2 blotting pads) in Towbin transfer buffer and assemble in the transfer cassette in the following order:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9n1km","text":"cathode plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7mfj9","text":"1 x blotting pad","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"86o4e","text":"1 x filter paper","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dm6je","text":"gel","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bl1gn","text":"nitrocellulose membrane","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"88gbt","text":"1 x filter paper","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ler6","text":"1 x pad","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fip12","text":"Use a roller to remove any air bubbles","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7r9n9","text":"Place cassette in transfer tank and transfer protein onto 0.2 µm nitrocellulose membranes (300 mA,     in cold Towbin buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":100,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":5400,"guid":"426713C0BCFE11ED8C5B43B5A8FDC981","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3uq0r","text":"Visualize ECL stained membrane using a BioRad ChemiDoc™. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"790pg","text":"Incubate membrane with peroxidase-conjugated goat anti-mouse and goat anti-rabbit IgG in TBS-T (1:5000 each).   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":110,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ab7tm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"RT","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"91mkk","text":"Incubate membranes in blocking solution containing mouse anti-α-synuclein (1:1000; RRID:AB_398108) and rabbit anti-β-actin (1:1000; RRID:AB_2305186)     ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":149,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":151,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":64800,"guid":"87185FB0BCFE11ED8C5B43B5A8FDC981","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":72000,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"892B1310BCFE11ED8C5B43B5A8FDC981","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"17mr6","text":"Block non-specific binding sites with blocking solution (TBS-T: TBS containing 2% BSA and 0.05 % Tween-20) for  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":111,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"7BE20B00BCFE11ED8C5B43B5A8FDC981","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

title: Western blot - alpha-synuclein
